body.name: Roku 40" Select Series 1080p Full HD Smart RokuTV with Voice Remote, Bright Picture, Customizable Home Screen, and Free TV
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 15 hrs 20 mins
features: Made by Roku: From the brand you trust to make streaming easier comes a new, thoughtfully designed smart TV powered by the delightfully simple Roku experience.
Bright picture: Enjoy your movies, shows, and games with sharp picture quality, exceptional clarity, and stunning brightness.
Designed for seamless streaming: With features like fast Wi-Fi and apps that launch in a snap, Roku Select TVs get you to your entertainment quick and easy.
Customizable home screen: Roku smart TVs put your favorite TV streaming apps, inputs, and free live TV front and center, so you can spend your time streaming—not scrolling.
Endless free TV: Enjoy the best selection of free entertainment with 400+ live TV streaming apps, award-winning Roku Originals, in-season shows, hit movies, kids’ TV, and more.
body.description: Roku Select Series Full HD TVs are thoughtfully designed for a delightful entertainment experience at an incredible value. Enjoy your streaming favorites in bright, full HD picture and catch every word with sound features like auto speech clarity and night mode. Switch to your inputs and watch free live TV right from the home screen, or use the voice remote to find movies, shows, or songs across thousands of streaming apps. From living rooms and bedrooms to kitchens and kids’ rooms, these Roku TVs are perfect for any room or budget without sacrificing quality. A smart TV made by Roku? Now that makes sense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There’s no faults to this tv! Good price, good color and quality, easy to assemble, and easy to use. Very satisfied. Connects to your phone as well with the Roku app in case you lose your remote. I’ve had it for a week and I’ve not had any issues with anything. It’s very user friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: TV was as described. Very easy Startup. Up and running in about 10 minuets. Picture was outstanding. A great value. Easy to navigate to what you want to watch. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled with my purchase of the 40" Roku TV! The setup was a breeze, and the user-friendly interface makes navigating through channels and apps a joy. The full HD display delivers stunning visuals with vibrant colors and sharp details.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love my new TV
reviews.reviewText: I got this Roku TV for my office/game room and I absolutely love it. The size is just right for gaming are watching your favorite shows. It’s very clear, the sound is amazing, and I’m in love with the game mode! I like how when you go though the setup it identifies what’s plugged I. And sets things up as needed. Very good so far. I am very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I only give it 4 stars because it's a basic smart TV (aka, not OLED, or some other high end TV). Size upgrade from a 24" to the 32" for the bedroom. The 24" was a Samsung with Roku device attached. which I liked. I also have a 55" TCL Roku TV. Very familiar with Roku and I like the interface. With Roku built into the TV, and if you have an antenna, the option to select antenna is built into the choices of on screen inputs. Makes it easy.This particular TV is fine. Nothing special over and above the other TV's I have. It's only 720P, but fine for a bedroom, etc. Picture is very good, and sound is fine (but obviously can be much better with a sound bar). One review mentioned that the plastic used to protect the bezel during shipping is hard to get off. They weren't wrong. Not that hard, but a bit of a pain. Why they don't make it easier to remove the plastic is beyond me. Getting nit picky with negatives, because it's not that big a deal, and there's really nothing else to complain about. Overall, a good quality TV at a good price. Recommended...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 40" Roku Smart Tv
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely loved everything about this 40" Roku Smart Tv. Not only was it a great price, the picture quality is amazing!! Best part was it was so simple to set up and start steaming apps. I highly recommend if your looking for a great TV!!! Roku, you have set the standard high, I was definitely not disappointed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would recommend this Roku T.V to anyone looking for a great T.V for an amazing Price $$.
reviews.reviewText: Ok so simple box to open, remove the remote and accessories. First and foremost read the ENVELOPE that’s RED 🧧and PURPLE before anything. The leg screws are in with the remote. You must lay the T.V face down to put legs on as recommended in instructions. (Right side leg was still loose even after fully tightened the screws) it was EASY to SET UP, APPS were PRE-LOADED that you get to pick from list. Just log into your favorite app and go. The T.V looks Good, are COLORS VIVID. I tested the Gaming console at1080p It Runs and looks terrific. (Yes I had to for our gamers, or what kind of a reviewer would I be hello!) SETTINGS are SIMPLE, SOUND is wonderful, MULTIPLE HD connections X3, which are fantastic if you have a few devices. So all and all I ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND this ROKU T.V.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with my purchase! It’s the perfect size and lightweight plus good quality. It’s a win, win in my eyes. This Roku TV doesn’t disappoint!!!
